test_cases.Title: ProbableLineupFULL-proj_001_probable_lineup_rendering_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Betting Sisal platform on a desktop device and navigate to the prematch campetti view for an upcoming match.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view is displayed for the selected match.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the probable lineups for both teams are displayed, sourced from the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API.
Steps.Expected Result: Probable lineups for both teams are visible and match the data from the API.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated and authorized to access the prematch campetti view.
2. Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API is available and returns valid data for the selected match.
test_cases.Dataset: Upcoming match with available probable lineup data in the Fantacalcio API.
test_cases.Expected Result: The probable lineups for both teams are correctly rendered in the prematch campetti view, matching the Fantacalcio API data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only probable lineup rendering on desktop.

test_cases.Title: OfficialLineup-proj_001_official_lineup_rendering_TEST_Mobile

Steps.Step Description: Open the Betting Sisal mobile app and navigate to the prematch campetti view for a match with official lineups available.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view loads for the selected match.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the official lineups for both teams are displayed, sourced from the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API.
Steps.Expected Result: Official lineups for both teams are visible and match the API data.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is logged into the mobile app.
2. Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API provides official lineup data for the match.
test_cases.Dataset: Match with official lineup data available in the Fantacalcio API.
test_cases.Expected Result: Official lineups are accurately displayed in the mobile app, reflecting the Fantacalcio API data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers official lineup rendering on mobile.

test_cases.Title: PlayerStarterPercentage-proj_001_starter_percentage_display_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the prematch campetti view for a match on the Betting Sisal desktop platform.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that each player in the probable lineup has a starter percentage displayed, as provided by the Fantacalcio API.
Steps.Expected Result: Starter percentage is shown for each player and matches the API data.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated.
2. Fantacalcio API provides starter percentage data for the match.
test_cases.Dataset: Match with starter percentage data for all players in the Fantacalcio API.
test_cases.Expected Result: Starter percentages for all players are correctly displayed and match the API data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers starter percentage display on desktop.

test_cases.Title: PlayerStatus-proj_001_player_status_info_TEST_Mobile

Steps.Step Description: Open the Betting Sisal mobile app and access the prematch campetti view for a selected match.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Check that players who are suspended, cautioned, or injured are indicated accordingly, based on Fantacalcio API data.
Steps.Expected Result: Players with special statuses (suspended, cautioned, injured) are clearly marked as per API data.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is logged into the mobile app.
2. Fantacalcio API provides status information for players in the match.
test_cases.Dataset: Match with at least one suspended, cautioned, or injured player in the Fantacalcio API.
test_cases.Expected Result: Player statuses (suspended, cautioned, injured) are correctly displayed in the mobile app, matching the API data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers player status info rendering on mobile.

test_cases.Title: TeamNews-proj_001_team_news_section_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the prematch campetti view for a match on the Betting Sisal desktop platform.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the 'Ultime dai campi' (team news) section is present and populated with news from the Fantacalcio LastFromFields API.
Steps.Expected Result: Team news section is visible and contains up-to-date news as per the API.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated.
2. Fantacalcio LastFromFields API provides news data for the teams in the match.
test_cases.Dataset: Match with available team news in the Fantacalcio API.
test_cases.Expected Result: The 'Ultime dai campi' section is correctly displayed and matches the Fantacalcio API news data.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers team news section rendering on desktop.

test_cases.Title: CrossBrand-proj_001_cross_brand_rendering_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the prematch campetti view for a match on the Betting Sisal desktop platform under Brand A.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view is displayed with Fantacalcio data for Brand A.

Steps.Step Description: Switch to Brand B within the same platform and access the same match's prematch campetti view.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view is displayed with Fantacalcio data for Brand B.

Steps.Step Description: Compare the rendering and data consistency of Fantacalcio information across both brands.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio data is rendered consistently and accurately across both brands.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has access to multiple brands within the Betting Sisal platform.
2. Fantacalcio APIs are available for both brands.
test_cases.Dataset: Same match available under multiple brands with Fantacalcio data.
test_cases.Expected Result: Fantacalcio data is rendered consistently across all brands within the Betting Sisal platform.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers cross-brand rendering on desktop.

test_cases.Title: APIFailure-proj_001_api_failure_handling_TEST_Mobile

Steps.Step Description: Simulate a failure or unavailability of the Fantacalcio ProbableLineupFULL API when accessing the prematch campetti view in the mobile app.
Steps.Expected Result: Prematch campetti view attempts to load Fantacalcio data.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the application's behavior and any error messages or fallback content displayed to the user.
Steps.Expected Result: A user-friendly error message or fallback content is displayed, and the application remains stable.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is logged into the mobile app.
2. Fantacalcio API is intentionally made unavailable or returns an error.
test_cases.Dataset: Match where Fantacalcio API is unavailable or returns an error.
test_cases.Expected Result: The application gracefully handles API failures, displaying appropriate messages and maintaining usability.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers API failure handling on mobile.

test_cases.Title: APIUsage_proj1_RU1_PreconditionValidation_API_TEST_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the Fantacalcio API service is up and running.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API endpoint responds to health check requests (e.g., HTTP 200 OK).

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the user has valid authentication credentials (API key or token).
Steps.Expected Result: Authentication credentials are present and valid.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access the Fantacalcio API endpoint with valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: API responds with expected data or success status (e.g., HTTP 200 OK).

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Fantacalcio API service is deployed and accessible.
2. Test user account with valid API credentials is available.
3. Network connectivity to the API endpoint is established.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid API endpoint URL, valid API key/token, test user account.
test_cases.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API is accessible and responds correctly when all preconditions are met.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the positive scenario for API precondition validation.

test_cases.Title: APIUsage_proj1_RU1_PreconditionMissingAuth_API_TEST_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the Fantacalcio API service is up and running.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API endpoint responds to health check requests (e.g., HTTP 200 OK).

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access the Fantacalcio API endpoint without providing authentication credentials.

test_cases.Title: APIUsage_proj1_RU1_PreconditionInvalidAuth_API_TEST_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the Fantacalcio API service is up and running.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API endpoint responds to health check requests (e.g., HTTP 200 OK).

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access the Fantacalcio API endpoint with invalid authentication credentials.

test_cases.Title: APIUsage_proj1_RU1_PreconditionServiceUnavailable_API_TEST_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Simulate Fantacalcio API service downtime (e.g., stop the service or block network access).
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API endpoint is not reachable.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access the Fantacalcio API endpoint with valid credentials during downtime.
Steps.Expected Result: API request fails with a service unavailable error (e.g., HTTP 503 Service Unavailable or timeout).

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Fantacalcio API service is intentionally made unavailable (e.g., stopped or network blocked).
2. Valid authentication credentials are available.
3. Network connectivity to the API endpoint is attempted but fails due to service unavailability.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid API endpoint URL, valid API key/token.
test_cases.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API is not accessible and returns a service unavailable error when the service is down.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers negative scenario for API service unavailability.

test_cases.Title: Verify-proj_001_Requirement_OPTA_ID_in_ProbableLineUpFULL_API_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Send a valid request to the 'ProbableLineUpFULL' API endpoint for a known match.
Steps.Expected Result: API returns a successful response with the expected data structure.

Steps.Step Description: Inspect the response payload for each entity (e.g., player, match, team).
Steps.Expected Result: Each entity in the response contains a field for the OPTA ID.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the OPTA ID field is populated and matches the expected format (e.g., numeric or alphanumeric as per OPTA standards).
Steps.Expected Result: OPTA ID field is present and correctly formatted for all relevant entities.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Access to the Fantacalcio API documentation and valid credentials.
2. The 'ProbableLineUpFULL' API is deployed and accessible in the test environment.
3. Test data (e.g., match IDs) are available and correspond to real or mock data with known OPTA IDs.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample match IDs, expected OPTA IDs for players and matches.
test_cases.Expected Result: The 'ProbableLineUpFULL' API response includes OPTA IDs for all relevant entities (player, match, etc.) as per requirements.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the 'ProbableLineUpFULL' API. Does not verify 'LastFromFields' API.

test_cases.Title: Negative-proj_001_Requirement_Missing_OPTA_ID_in_ProbableLineUpFULL_API_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Send a valid request to the 'ProbableLineUpFULL' API endpoint for a known match.

Steps.Step Description: Inspect the response payload for each entity (e.g., player, match, team).
Steps.Expected Result: Each entity in the response contains a field for the OPTA ID.

Steps.Step Description: Intentionally remove or simulate missing OPTA ID in the test data for one or more entities.
Steps.Expected Result: API response either omits the OPTA ID field or leaves it empty/null for the affected entity.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the system's behavior when the OPTA ID is missing.

3. Ability to manipulate or simulate test data with missing OPTA IDs.

test_cases.Expected Result: The system handles missing OPTA IDs gracefully, with appropriate error handling or warnings as per API specification.

test_cases.Title: FantacalcioPriority-proj_RU2_PrematchCampetti_SerieA_Sisal_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application as an end user on the Desktop platform.
Steps.Expected Result: Application loads successfully and user is authenticated (if required).

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Calcio' section and select the 'Serie A' manifestazione.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Serie A' prematch view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Ensure the current brand context is set to 'Sisal'.
Steps.Expected Result: Brand context is confirmed as 'Sisal'.

Steps.Step Description: Open the prematch campetti (field view) for an upcoming Serie A match.
Steps.Expected Result: The prematch campetti is displayed using the Fantacalcio provider.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Fantacalcio provider is configured as the priority for 'Serie A' manifestazione and 'Sisal' brand.
2. The application is deployed with the latest release containing this configuration.
3. User has access to the application and is able to select brands and manifestazioni.
test_cases.Dataset: Serie A manifestazione, Sisal brand, at least one upcoming match available.
test_cases.Expected Result: For 'Serie A' under the 'Sisal' brand, the prematch campetti is displayed using the Fantacalcio provider.

test_cases.Title: FantacalcioExclusion_proj4_RU4_MatchDayLogic_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the MatchCalendar API for the relevant competition (e.g., Serie A).
Steps.Expected Result: MatchCalendar API returns a list of matches with their associated Match Day values.

Steps.Step Description: Identify all matches currently quoted in the Sisal palinsesto for the competition.
Steps.Expected Result: List of quoted matches is available, each with its corresponding Match Day value.

Steps.Step Description: Determine the highest Match Day value among the quoted matches.
Steps.Expected Result: The highest Match Day value is correctly identified.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that Fantacalcio API is used only for matches with the highest Match Day value.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API is used exclusively for matches with the highest Match Day value.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that for matches with lower Match Day values (e.g., recuperi), Fantacalcio API is not used and Sportradar is used for official lineups only.
Steps.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API is excluded for matches with lower Match Day values; Sportradar is used for official lineups.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Sisal palinsesto contains matches from multiple Match Days, including at least one recupero (make-up match) and matches from the current or imminent Match Day.
2. MatchCalendar API is accessible and returns valid data.
3. Fantacalcio and Sportradar APIs are integrated and available for use.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample MatchCalendar API response with matches from different Match Days (e.g., giornata 7 and giornata 20).
test_cases.Expected Result: Fantacalcio API is used only for matches with the highest Match Day value in the palinsesto; for recuperi, Fantacalcio is excluded and Sportradar is used for official lineups.
test_cases._polarion: Esclusione Fantacalcio su specifico match ‚Äì Recuperi e Match Day (RU 4)

test_cases.Title: CorrectLineupOrder-proj7_RU7_LineupRendering_Campetto_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Sisal Campetto client on Desktop.
Steps.Expected Result: The Campetto interface loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Trigger the API call to ProbableLineup Full for a team with a 4-2-3-1 formation (Trend: '4231').
Steps.Expected Result: API response is received with 'Trend' set to '4231' and a 'Starter' list of 11 players.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the lineup on the field is rendered using only the 'Trend' and the order of players in 'Starter', ignoring the 'position' attribute.
Steps.Expected Result: Players are placed on the field according to the 4-2-3-1 formation, following the order from 'Starter' (top-bottom, right-left), not the 'position' attribute.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Sisal Campetto client is installed and accessible on Desktop.
2. Test team data with 'Trend' set to '4231' and a valid 'Starter' list is available in the API response.
3. User is authenticated and authorized to view the lineup.
test_cases.Dataset: API response with 'Trend':'4231' and ordered 'Starter' list of 11 players.
test_cases.Expected Result: The lineup is displayed in the correct 4-2-3-1 formation, with players ordered as per the 'Starter' list, ignoring the 'position' attribute.

Steps.Expected Result: The Campo view is displayed.

Steps.Expected Result: The Campo view UI adapts responsively and maintains alignment with the Figma design.

2. The user is logged in (if authentication is required).
3. The device has internet connectivity.

test_cases.Title: UltimeCampi_proj10_RU10_DisplayTeam1Text_FieldView_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the game client and navigate to the Campo (Field) view.
Steps.Expected Result: Campo view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select Squadra 1 (Team 1) from the available team selection options.
Steps.Expected Result: Squadra 1 is selected and highlighted in the UI.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the section designated for 'Ultime dai campi' (Last from Fields) for Squadra 1.
Steps.Expected Result: The HTML text from the 'Text' field of the LastFromFields API for Squadra 1 is displayed exactly as provided by the API, including formatting.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated and has access to the game client.
2. The Fantacalcio LastFromFields API is available and returns valid HTML text for Squadra 1.
3. Campo view is accessible in the client.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user credentials; API returns: { "Team": "Squadra 1", "Text": "Ultime notizie Squadra 1" }
test_cases.Expected Result: The Campo view displays the HTML text from the LastFromFields API for Squadra 1 when Squadra 1 is selected.

test_cases.Title: UltimeCampi_proj10_RU10_HTMLRendering_FieldView_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the game client and navigate to the Campo (Field) view.
Steps.Expected Result: Campo view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select Squadra 1 (or Squadra 2) from the team selection options.
Steps.Expected Result: Selected team is highlighted in the UI.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the 'Ultime dai campi' section for the selected team.
Steps.Expected Result: The HTML formatting (e.g., bold, italics, links) from the API's 'Text' field is rendered correctly in the UI.

2. The Fantacalcio LastFromFields API returns HTML-formatted text for both teams.

test_cases.Title: UltimeCampi_proj10_RU10_APIUnavailable_FieldView_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the game client and navigate to the Campo (Field) view.
Steps.Expected Result: Campo view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate the Fantacalcio LastFromFields API being unavailable or returning an error (e.g., 500 Internal Server Error).
Steps.Expected Result: The API does not return valid data.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the 'Ultime dai campi' section for both teams.
Steps.Expected Result: A user-friendly error message or placeholder is displayed, indicating that the latest news is currently unavailable.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated and has access to the game client.
2. Campo view is accessible in the client.
3. The Fantacalcio LastFromFields API is unavailable or returns an error.
test_cases.Dataset: API returns HTTP 500 or is unreachable.
test_cases.Expected Result: The Campo view displays a clear error message or placeholder when the API is unavailable, without breaking the UI.

test_cases.Title: UltimeCampi_proj10_RU10_SwitchTeams_FieldView_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the game client and navigate to the Campo (Field) view.
Steps.Expected Result: Campo view is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select Squadra 1 and observe the 'Ultime dai campi' section.
Steps.Expected Result: HTML text for Squadra 1 is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Switch selection to Squadra 2.
Steps.Expected Result: HTML text for Squadra 2 is displayed, replacing Squadra 1's text.

Steps.Step Description: Switch back to Squadra 1.
Steps.Expected Result: HTML text for Squadra 1 is displayed again.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User is authenticated and has access to the game client.
2. The Fantacalcio LastFromFields API returns valid HTML text for both teams.
3. Campo view is accessible in the client.
test_cases.Dataset: API returns: { "Team": "Squadra 1", "Text": "Text 1" }, { "Team": "Squadra 2", "Text": "Text 2" }
test_cases.Expected Result: Switching between teams updates the 'Ultime dai campi' section to display the correct team's HTML text each time.

test_cases.Title: UltimeCampi_proj10_RU10_EmptyText_FieldView_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Expected Result: Campo view is displayed.

test_cases.Title: CautionedPlayersDisplay_proj11_RU11_FieldView_Display_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and navigate to the match view for a scheduled game.
Steps.Expected Result: The match view is displayed with both teams visible.

Steps.Step Description: Switch to the 'Campo' (Field) view within the match interface.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view is loaded, showing both teams' lineups.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the section dedicated to 'Giocatori Diffidati' (Cautioned Players) for each team.
Steps.Expected Result: A list of cautioned players is displayed for each team, if any, in the 'Campo' view.

Steps.Step Description: Cross-check the displayed cautioned players with the 'cautionedsPlayers' field from the ProbableLineupFULL API response for both teams.
Steps.Expected Result: The list of cautioned players in the UI matches exactly with the 'cautionedsPlayers' field from the API for both teams.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials and is logged into the application.
2. There is at least one scheduled match with both teams having at least one cautioned player in the API response.
3. The ProbableLineupFULL API is accessible and returns valid data for the selected match.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample match with known cautioned players in the API response (e.g., Team A: Player X, Team B: Player Y).
test_cases.Expected Result: The 'Giocatori Diffidati' section in the Campo view displays, for each team, the exact list of cautioned players as provided by the 'cautionedsPlayers' field in the ProbableLineupFULL API.

test_cases.Title: NoCautionedPlayers_proj11_RU11_FieldView_NoDisplay_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and navigate to the match view for a scheduled game.
Steps.Expected Result: The match view is displayed with both teams visible.

Steps.Step Description: Switch to the 'Campo' (Field) view within the match interface.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view is loaded, showing both teams' lineups.

Steps.Step Description: Observe the section dedicated to 'Giocatori Diffidati' (Cautioned Players) for each team.
Steps.Expected Result: If no cautioned players are present in the API for either team, the 'Giocatori Diffidati' section is either hidden or displays a message such as 'Nessun giocatore diffidato' (No cautioned players).

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. User has valid credentials and is logged into the application.
2. There is at least one scheduled match where both teams have an empty 'cautionedsPlayers' field in the API response.
3. The ProbableLineupFULL API is accessible and returns valid data for the selected match.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample match with no cautioned players in the API response for both teams.
test_cases.Expected Result: If no cautioned players are present for a team, the UI does not display the 'Giocatori Diffidati' section for that team or shows an appropriate message indicating the absence of cautioned players.

test_cases.Title: DisqualifiedPlayers-RU12_FieldView_DisplayDisqualifiedPlayers_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and navigate to the 'Campo' (Field) view for a scheduled match.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view is displayed, showing both teams' lineups.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that for each of the two teams, a section or list labeled for disqualified players is present.
Steps.Expected Result: A section or list for disqualified players is visible for both teams.

Steps.Step Description: Check that the names of the disqualified players match the data provided in the 'disqualifiedsPlayers' field from the ProbableLineupFULL API response for each team.
Steps.Expected Result: The displayed disqualified players exactly match the 'disqualifiedsPlayers' field from the API for both teams.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. The application is deployed and accessible on a desktop environment.
2. The user is authenticated and authorized to view match details.
3. The ProbableLineupFULL API is operational and returns valid data including the 'disqualifiedsPlayers' field for both teams.
test_cases.Functionality: Display of Disqualified Players in Field View
test_cases.Dataset: Sample match with at least one disqualified player per team as per API response.
test_cases.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view displays, for each team, the list of disqualified players as provided by the 'disqualifiedsPlayers' field from the ProbableLineupFULL API.

Steps.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view is displayed, showing both teams' lineups.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the section or list for disqualified players is present but empty or displays an appropriate message for both teams.
Steps.Expected Result: The disqualified players section is empty or shows a message such as 'No disqualified players' for both teams.

test_cases.Preconditions:

test_cases.Title: UnavailablePlayers-RU13_FieldView_DisplayUnavailablePlayersList_TEST_Desktop

test_cases.Title: BallotPlayersDisplay_proj14_RU14_BallotPlayersField_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and navigate to the 'Campo' (Field) view for a match with two teams.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Campo' view is displayed, showing both teams' probable lineups.

Steps.Step Description: For each team, identify the section where players in ballot (ballottaggio) are displayed.
Steps.Expected Result: A section is present for each team, listing pairs of players in ballot for the same role.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that for each ballot pair, both players are shown with their respective percentage of starting probability (% di titolarit√†).
Steps.Expected Result: Each ballot player is displayed with an accurate percentage value next to their name.

Steps.Step Description: Cross-check the displayed ballot players and their percentages with the data returned by the 'ballotsPlayers' field in the 'ProbableLineupFULL' API response.
Steps.Expected Result: The UI displays exactly the same ballot players and percentages as provided by the API for both teams.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. The application is accessible on a desktop computer.
2. The user is authenticated and has access to the 'Campo' view.
3. The 'ProbableLineupFULL' API returns valid ballot player data for the selected match.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample match with ballot players data in the API response (e.g., Team A: Player X vs Player Y for Forward, Team B: Player M vs Player N for Midfielder).

test_cases.Title: LastUpdateDisplay_proj18_RU18_NoUpdateAvailable_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Simulate the API returning a match entry without a 'lastUpdate' field.
Steps.Expected Result: The application receives a match entry with no 'lastUpdate' value.

Steps.Step Description: Access the 'Lista' and 'Campo' views for the affected match.
Steps.Expected Result: The views are displayed with match information.

Steps.Step Description: Observe how the application displays the 'Ultimo Aggiornamento' for the affected match.
Steps.Expected Result: The application displays a placeholder (e.g., '-') or a message indicating the information is not available, and does not crash.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Tester has valid access to the application.
2. The backend is configured to return at least one match without a 'lastUpdate' field in the API response.
test_cases.Dataset: Match entry with missing 'lastUpdate' field in the API.
test_cases.Expected Result: The application handles missing 'lastUpdate' values gracefully, displaying a placeholder or message without crashing.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers handling of missing update information.

test_cases.Title: LastUpdateDisplay_proj18_RU18_MobileListView_Display_TEST_Android

Steps.Step Description: Open the application on an Android device and navigate to the 'Lista' (List) view displaying matches.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Lista' view is displayed with a list of matches.

Steps.Step Description: For each match, locate the 'Ultimo Aggiornamento' (Last Update) information.
Steps.Expected Result: Each match entry displays a 'Ultimo Aggiornamento' field.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the date and time are displayed in the format GG/MM/AAAA - HH:MM.
Steps.Expected Result: The date and time for each match are shown in the correct format (e.g., 12/06/2024 - 15:30).

Steps.Step Description: Cross-check the displayed date and time with the 'lastUpdate' value from the ProbableLineupFULL API for each match.
Steps.Expected Result: The displayed 'Ultimo Aggiornamento' matches the 'lastUpdate' value from the API for each match.

test_cases.Preconditions:
1. Android device with the application installed.
2. User is logged in and has access to the 'Lista' view.
3. The application is connected to the backend and can retrieve data from the ProbableLineupFULL API.
4. There are matches available with valid 'lastUpdate' values in the API.
test_cases.Dataset: Sample matches with known 'lastUpdate' values in the API (e.g., Match C: 14/06/2024 - 20:00).
test_cases.Expected Result: For every match in the 'Lista' view on Android, the 'Ultimo Aggiornamento' is displayed in the correct format and matches the API value.
